symptoms.name: Scarlet fever symptoms
symptoms.pattern: May include rash, fever, sore throat, headache, and body aches.

symptoms.name: Myocarditis symptoms
symptoms.severity: Variable, can range from mild to severe
symptoms.pattern: May include chest pain, shortness of breath, palpitations, fatigue, and edema.  Severity depends on the extent of myocardial involvement.

vital_signs.blood_pressure: May be elevated or decreased depending on severity

imaging_findings.Echocardiogram: May show reduced ejection fraction, wall motion abnormalities, or pericardial effusion
imaging_findings.Chest X-ray: May show cardiomegaly (enlarged heart) in severe cases

required: Clinical presentation consistent with scarlet fever (rash, fever, sore throat)
Evidence of myocarditis (symptoms, physical findings, ECG changes, elevated cardiac enzymes)
supportive: Positive throat culture for Group A Streptococcus

differential_diagnoses: Other causes of myocarditis (viral infections, autoimmune diseases)
Other causes of fever and rash (viral exanthems, drug reactions)
